original_text: And they entered into a covenant to seek the Lord God of their fathers with all their heart and with all their soul;
korean_text: 또 마음을 다하고 목숨을 다하여 조상들의 하나님 여호와를 찾기로 언약하고

sentences.original_text: And they entered into a covenant
to seek the Lord God of their fathers
with all their heart and with all their soul
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 모든 마음과 모든 영혼을 다하여
